data.eml:eml: Haptomerus maculosus, a new species of the tribe Myorhinini from Zambia (Coleoptera: Curculionidae: Entiminae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Borovec, Roman, Nakládal, Oto (2019): Haptomerus maculosus, a new species of the tribe Myorhinini from Zambia (Coleoptera: Curculionidae: Entiminae). Zootaxa 4563 (2): 387-395, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4563.2.11
